editor.view
 
  • Classes in editor.view used by editor.controller
    Class
    Description
    EditorFrame
    Singleton class representing the main editor frame in the level editor.
    EditorPanel
    EditorPanel is responsible for displaying and interacting with the game editor grid.
    LevelsPopUpMenu
    A popup menu for managing levels in the editor.
    LevelsPopUpMenu.MenuType
     
    SelectionButton
    A button with an image and a code.
    SpriteSelectionScrollPane
    A scroll pane that allows users to select various sprites, including blocks, enemies, players, and others.
